comments:
After doing many expression evaluations, I found many stack dumps in my log, 
like the following. Not sure when/how they appeared.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.jdt.debug 4 5010 May 22, 2002 09:34:49.334
!MESSAGE com.sun.jdi.ObjectCollectedException occurred retrieving type

Though the stack traces are different, this could be related to Bug 16834.

It's not surprising that this happens. If the object that is represented by an 
expresssion is collected, this exception will occur.

Since this is an expected case, we shouldn't be logging the exception. 
JDIModelPresentation.getExpressionText() should intercept DebugExceptions and 
rethrow the exception if the underlying exception is NOT an 
ObjectCollectedException.

Implemented as explained above.

Please verify.
